Airline Reservation System

Technologies Used: Java EE, HTML5, CSS3, MSSQL Database & Netbeans IDE

Description

This scenario saw an airline needing a software application to take care of the reservation issues. Our tasks included implementing multiple features such as a login system, admin panel for the admin to manipulate the data for the users and flights, displaying flights and information about the airline, and applying a ticket reservation system. I implemented the features for the admin panel and ticket reservation to ensure data received form the application was properly stored in the database. This project required close communication with team members to drive success. Screenshots of the website are listed below
